name: The Dreamer's Princess [Beta Demo]
description:
The Dreamer's Princess

(ReWrite Ver)

The Dreamer's Princess is a Maze Bullet Hell Shooter in development, that is inspired by games such as Meritous, The Etrian Odyssey series, and the Touhou Series. It is designed in a way that shmupg fans of any skills can enjoy at their own pace and play style.

The Objective in the Mazes is to look for a Key, and then use it on the door, while avoiding or confronting other dreamers.

Notice; Currently this is in beta, with new content being developed, as bugs are being ironed out. However, there are still a few known bugs, but I kindly ask of you to report any bugs that you may find.

Known Bugs

  • Some animations don't loop.*
  • Some enemies might look to walk outside the maze (slide by walls)
  • In Some Platforms Mouse Aim doesn't work??? (Confirmed on Boss)

Controls

MoveWASD/DPad/Left JoyAim/CameraMouse/Right JoyAttackButton North/South/R1/R2PauseEnter/Start
Restart*
Esc/Select (Pause or Game Over)

I look forward to your feedback! Thank you for your time!
